alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cameron, southeastern Jefferson Davis and south central Calcasieu Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Holmwood to near Hacketts Corner to near Hayes to near Thornwell. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Arthur, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lowry, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, and Hacketts Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
